duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and implement supply chain optimization projects (e.g., Customer WMS implementation, warehouse-slotting, route planning)
Oversee inventory procedures
Develop requirements and standards (e.g., packaging, procurement, delivery)
Discover the most cost-effective shipping modes and schedules
Help foster trusting relationships with vendors and team members
Collaborate with IT professionals to implement effective systems
Track KPIs and report on supply chain performance

Manage warehouse operations o Motivate and discipline staff o Suggest areas of improvement o Ensure warehouse and areas are clean and safe o Establish Productivity metrics for processes o Maintain warehouse staff by recruiting, orienting, and training o Oversee receiving, warehousing, and distribution operations o Cost Control
Terminal Processing equipment o Evaluate need, source and maintain processing equipment
Managing Consumables and Equipment o All mail consumables; labels, tags, bags o Ensure warehouse equipment’s effectiveness and safety o All office consumables; office supplies
Revenue Protection Process for all products
Communicate and work with Director of Operations to support all products and customer satisfaction
Produce reports on operations as required by Director of Operations
Establish Productivity metrics for processes
Exceed all established metrics for performance of operations
Advise the Director of Operations on financial planning, budgeting, priorities, and policy matters
Maintain continuous lines of communication, keeping the Director of Operations informed of all critical issues
Maintain unity in the operations
Promote a culture of high performance and continuous improvement that values learning and a commitment to providing quality services
Ensure staff members receive timely and appropriate training and development
Mentor and develop staff using a supportive and collaborative approach: assign accountabilities; set objectives; establish priorities; and evaluate results
Assist with other duties as assigned by the Director of Operations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred, but minimum 5 years relevant industry experience in management positions of increasing responsibility required
